scripts.pull:mainnet: bos components download bos.dapplets.near network-config mainnet
scripts.pull:testnet: bos components download bos.dapplets.testnet network-config testnet
scripts.push:mainnet: bos components deploy bos.dapplets.near sign-as bos.dapplets.near network-config mainnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.push:testnet: bos components deploy bos.dapplets.testnet sign-as bos.dapplets.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.diff:mainnet: bos components diff bos.dapplets.near network-config mainnet
scripts.diff:testnet: bos components diff bos.dapplets.testnet network-config testnet
scripts.build:mainnet: rm -r build && cp -r src build && find build -type f | xargs -I '{}' sed -i '' 's/${REPL_ACCOUNT}/bos.dapplets.near/g' {}
scripts.build:testnet: rm -r build && cp -r src build && find build -type f | xargs -I '{}' sed -i '' 's/${REPL_ACCOUNT}/bos.dapplets.testnet/g' {}
